billing_autorenew_service_update_descrip: Choose the type of renewal you would like (automatic or manual). For automatic renewal, you can also choose how often you pay.
billing_autorenew_service_update_success: Renewal for the {{service}} service has been updated. If the change does not appear in the list, please refresh the page.
billing_autorenew_service_update_error: An error has occurred configuring the renewal {{ message }}
